Name: Rock Paper Sock
About the game: Rock Paper Sock is a realtime, online rock paper scissors game & chill zone! Features Play rock paper scissors against sheep, farmers, dragons, other players, and more! 4+ hours of gameplay. 50+ items to collect. 10+ enemies to battle. Customise your own character with cool gear. Level your rock, paper, and scissors levels. Hang out and chat with other players. A mysterious wizard stuck in a mysterious crystal. Cool graphics. Controls Left mouse button to interact. Right mouse to inspect. Arrow keys to rotate the camera. The rest of the keyboard to chat! Note: A working internet connection is required to play this game!
